body.p: The Board was asked to clarify the requirements of IAS 19 to determine the discount rate in a regional market sharing the same currency (for example, the Eurozone). The issue arose because some think that the basket of high quality corporate bonds should be determined at a country level, and not at a currency level, because paragraph 83 of IAS 19 states that in countries in which there is no deep market in such bonds, the market yields at the end of the reporting period on government bonds shall be used.
